price: Maze igituza cyanjye kigafungana (kubera intimba n’agahinda), kandi ururimi rwanjye ntirubanguka (mu gusobanura amagambo). Bityo nyoherereza Haruna (aze amfashe).”
arabic: وَيَضِيقُ صَدۡرِي وَلَا يَنطَلِقُ لِسَانِي فَأَرۡسِلۡ إِلَىٰ هَٰرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wayaḍīqu ṣadrī walā yanṭaliqu lisānī fa-arsil ilā hārūna
